Room.Name: Pink Drake Gaming Pit
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a deep pit with steep sides, and iron cages set in the sides.
Room.LongDescription: Inside the cages are pink and cold drakes, which are found locally in the interior of the jungle near the old ruined temple. The Orcs on the veranda above like to see them fight, and they usually bet on the outcome. What are you doing down here? The cages are about to be opened!
